title: Pancreaticoduodenectomy after endoscopic ultrasound-guided lumen apposing metal stent (LAMS): A case series evaluating feasibility and short-term outcomes
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Luke T. Meredith, David Baek, Alisha Agarwal, Faisal Kamal, Anand R. Kumar, Alexander Schlachterman, Thomas E. Kowalski, Charles J. Yeo, Harish Lavu, Avinoam Nevler, Wilbur B. Bowne
